candidates.title: Bump minimum supported Rust version to 1.56.1
adds support for host functions to ics23
candidates.body: This encapsulates all crypto hash functions behind a trait, so downstream crates can delegate these functions to host functions

candidates.title: Bump prost to 0.10 in /rust
candidates.body: The dependencies to `prost` and `prost-build` are updated to the latest version.

candidates.title: Handle empty with custom order
candidates.body: Make sure left/right_branches_are_empty code properly accounts for custom ordering (when branches are not in lexographical order).

candidates.title: Bump `prost` to version 0.9
candidates.body:
Closes: #52

I made sure to regenerate the Rust proto definitions with `cargo protoc` and `cargo fmt` but they didn't change at all.

This changes have been tested in `ibc-rs` via this corresponding PR: https://github.com/informalsystems/ibc-rs/pull/1501
